text: Smarana karo! Rasulagana tadera kache esechilena tadera samane theke o tadera pechana theke e'i bale -- ''allah byatita karo upasana karo na.’’ Tara balechila -- ''amadera prabhu yadi iccha karatena tahale tini niscaya'i phiris‌tadera pathate paratena, sejan'ya tomadera ya diye pathano hayeche amara alabat tate abisbasi.’’
